title: Orally Inhaled Flecainide for Conversion of Atrial Fibrillation to Sinus Rhythm: INSTANT Phase 2 Trial
authors: Jeremy N. Ruskin, A. John Camm, Christopher Dufton, Anderson C. Woite-Silva, Ype Tuininga, Erik Badings, Jonas S.S.G. De Jong, Thomas Oosterhof, Ismail Aksoy, Aaf F.M. Kuijper, Isabelle C.
